I am the strongest in the world."},{"lineNumber":36764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　周りのお供どもも、まあ仕事はする」","translatedEnglishLine":"My followers around me do their jobs as well.\""},{"lineNumber":36765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……せやけどランス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...But Rance."},{"lineNumber":36766,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな、万事楽勝とはいかんで」","translatedEnglishLine":"It won't always be that easy."},{"lineNumber":36767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、コパンドン」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm, Kopandon.\""},{"lineNumber":36768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「船長、進捗はどんなもんや？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Captain, how's the progress?\""},{"lineNumber":36769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「予定通りに進んでる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We're proceeding as planned."},{"lineNumber":36770,"originalJapaneseLine":"　計画を聞いた時はとんでもない無謀かと思ったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"When I heard the plan, I thought it was reckless,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ！　向こうの船で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah! On that ship over there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナギちゃんが手、振ってるよ。おーい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagi-chan is waving her hand. Hey there!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お−、ほんとだ。おーいおーい。へへ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it's true. Hey hey. Hehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おぉぉ……ほ、本当に動いておる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh... i-it's really moving..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なぜ水の中なのに沈まんのじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why isn't it sinking even though it's in the water...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、うーん……こういうの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, hmm... with things like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原理を説明しても安心しないんだろなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if I explain the principle, you probably wouldn't feel reassured..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うううう、揺れる……リセットー、リセットー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uuuu, it's shaking... Reset, reset!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸から吹く風を帆にいっぱいに受けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving the wind blowing from the continent fully on their sails,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サンライズ号とサンセット号は順調に進んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Sunrise and Sunset ships proceeded smoothly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに並行するように、白竜キャンテルやホルス達、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alongside, the White Dragon Cantel, Horus, and others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛べるメンバーが空を舞う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the flying members soared through the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……いいな。船旅も悪くないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... not bad. A sea voyage isn't so bad either.
But..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「取り舵だ！　風向き、少し怪しいな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hard to port! The wind direction is a bit suspicious...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三番マスト、縦帆に張り替えとけ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Replace the sails on the third mast with vertical ones!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「りょうかーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Roger that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当直、しっかり見張れよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Officer on watch, keep a close lookout!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスターも、波の動きもだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watch out for monsters and the movement of the waves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へーーいっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heeey!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アレだ。アレが邪魔だ。むさ苦しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's that. That guy's a nuisance. Scruffy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の船におっさんを乗せなければならんとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to have an old man on my ship..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「納得されてなかったんですか、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You weren't convinced, Lord Rance...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「御者みたいなもんだと思ってたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought he was like a coachman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれこれうるさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he's so noisy about this and that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴチャゴチャ動き回るから目につくし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He keeps moving about awkwardly and draws attention."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……でも、船長さんたちがいないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's true... but without the captains,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 船は動きませんし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the ship won't move..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぬ……しかし、アレだ。下っ端はともかく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... but that said, putting aside the lower ranks...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて船長が可愛い女の子ならいいのだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at least if the captain were a cute girl, it would be better..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう方は……いなさそうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think there is anyone like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だーーー！　気に食わん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it! I don't like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、スカート引っ張らないでくださいー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't pull my skirt!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの怒りをよそに、サンライズ号の航海は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Rance's anger, the voyage of the Sunrise ship

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順調な滑り出しを見せていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was off to a smooth start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、楽勝楽勝。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, too easy, too easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海にモンスターが出るとは驚いたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm surprised monsters appeared in the sea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい退屈しのぎだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it's a good way to pass the boredom."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すげえ強さだな……たいしたもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Incredible strength... quite something."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだおっさん。暇なのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What’s up, old man? Got nothing to do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、戦闘を手伝おうかと思ったんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I thought I'd help with the battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで必要なさそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems completely unnecessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当たり前だ。俺様は世界最強だからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. I am the strongest in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周りのお供どもも、まあ仕事はする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My followers around me do their jobs as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……せやけどランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな、万事楽勝とはいかんで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't always be that easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、コパンドン」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm, Kopandon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「船長、進捗はどんなもんや？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Captain, how's the progress?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予定通りに進んでる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're proceeding as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計画を聞いた時はとんでもない無謀かと思ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I heard the plan, I thought it was reckless,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Replace the sails on the third mast with vertical ones!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「りょうかーい！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Officer on watch, keep a close lookout!

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's that. That guy's a nuisance. Scruffy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の船におっさんを乗せなければならんとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have to have an old man on my ship..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「納得されてなかったんですか、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You weren't convinced, Lord Rance...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「御者みたいなもんだと思ってたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought he was like a coachman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれこれうるさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he's so noisy about this and that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴチャゴチャ動き回るから目につくし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He keeps moving about awkwardly and draws attention."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……でも、船長さんたちがいないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's true... but without the captains,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 船は動きませんし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the ship won't move..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぬ……しかし、アレだ。下っ端はともかく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... but that said, putting aside the lower ranks...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて船長が可愛い女の子ならいいのだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: at least if the captain were a cute girl, it would be better..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう方は……いなさそうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think there is anyone like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だーーー！　気に食わん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it! I don't like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、スカート引っ張らないでくださいー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't pull my skirt!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの怒りをよそに、サンライズ号の航海は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Rance's anger, the voyage of the Sunrise ship

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 順調な滑り出しを見せていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was off to a smooth start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、楽勝楽勝。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, too easy, too easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海にモンスターが出るとは驚いたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm surprised monsters appeared in the sea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい退屈しのぎだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it's a good way to pass the boredom."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すげえ強さだな……たいしたもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Incredible strength... quite something."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだおっさん。暇なのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What’s up, old man? Got nothing to do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、戦闘を手伝おうかと思ったんだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I thought I'd help with the battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで必要なさそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems completely unnecessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当たり前だ。俺様は世界最強だからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. I am the strongest in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周りのお供どもも、まあ仕事はする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My followers around me do their jobs as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……せやけどランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな、万事楽勝とはいかんで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't always be that easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、コパンドン」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm, Kopandon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「船長、進捗はどんなもんや？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Captain, how's the progress?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予定通りに進んでる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're proceeding as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 計画を聞いた時はとんでもない無謀かと思ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I heard the plan, I thought it was reckless,
